metadata.title: CVE-2019-10207 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's Bluetooth implementation of UART,all versions kernel 3.x.x before 4.18.0 and kernel 5.x.x. An attacker withlocal access and write permissions to the Bluetooth hardware could use thisflaw to issue a specially crafted ioctl function call and cause the systemto crash.
